sensitiveInfoTypesIds.Description: List of selected sensitive info types' IDs.

sensitivityThresholdLabelOrder.Description: The order of the sensitivity threshold label. Any label at or above this order will be considered sensitive. If set to -1, sensitivity by labels is turned off

sensitivityThresholdLabelId.Description: The id of the sensitivity threshold label. Any label at or above this rank will be considered sensitive.

sensitiveInfoTypesIds.Description: List of selected sensitive info types' IDs.

sensitivityThresholdLabelOrder.Description: The order of the sensitivity threshold label. Any label at or above this order will be considered sensitive. If set to -1, sensitivity by labels is turned off

sensitivityThresholdLabelId.Description: The id of the sensitivity threshold label. Any label at or above this rank will be considered sensitive.

mipInformation.Description: Microsoft information protection built-in and custom information types, labels, and integration status.

labels.Description: List of Microsoft information protection sensitivity labels

customInfoTypes.Description: List of custom user-defined information types

builtInInfoTypes.Description: List of pre-configured sensitive information types

name.Description: The display name of the label

order.Description: Labels are ordered by sensitivity level. The higher the order of the label, the more sensitive it is.

name.Description: Display name of the info type
Display name of the info type

type.Description: Category of the built-in info type
